author: 0xraino
content: I'm curious about the mean and variance of # of blocks proposed by single entity given the distribution of stakers.

author: jgm
content: The last participant has a measure of control over that process, as they can either include or not their contribution.

author: jgm
content: Commit/reveal is an option, but a fair amount of effort.  VDF seems to be the way that the thinking is going for randomness.

author: sky.cactus
content: Commit reveal is only as secure as the bond for not revealing, and it is only paid when an attacker succeeds.  Also, multiple parties can collude to further decrease security and they only eat the bond cost once when the collusion succeeds.
